titles.title: Lord, You've Really Been Good To Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, You've really been good to me,
Lord, You've really been good to me:
You've taken my burden, and You've set me free,
You've really been good to me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I want to thank You for all You've done,
You've rescued and You've ransomed me;
My life was all in pieces, but You've made it one,
You've really been good to me!
